title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and tool callers.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, RAG).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental Copilot plugin to route code-completion queries to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation stack using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot example streaming answers from Ollama.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor or explain code via Ollama models.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Official example showing how to generate embeddings with Ollama (e.g., nomic-embed-text).

title: ollama-deno
summary: Community-maintained Deno / TypeScript runtime client for Ollama.

title: ollama-ruby
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET client for Ollama with both sync and async APIs.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Official registry of pre-converted Modelfile definitions (Llama3, Mistral, CodeLlama…).

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker & docker-compose snippets for CPU and GPU (CUDA/ROCm) setups.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of Ollama projects.
